topPRs.title: Add plugin-ai16x402 to registry
topPRs.author: ai16x402
topPRs.body:
# Plugin Submission: plugin-ai16x402

Plugin di trading Solana con analisi AI e dati KOL in tempo reale.

## Dettagli Plugin
- **NPM**: https://www.npmjs.com/package/plugin-ai16x402
- **Repository**: https://github.com/ai16x402/elizaos-plugin-ai16x402
- **Versione**: 1.0.0
- **Categoria**: trading

## Funzionalit√†
- Analisi token in tempo reale con raccomandazioni BUY/HOLD/SELL
- Monitoraggio hot tokens (timeframe 1h)
- Tracking leaderboard top trader
- Segnali di trading AI con confidence score

topPRs.title: Add plugin-otaku-x402 to registry
topPRs.author: otaku-x402
topPRs.body:
## Plugin Submission: Otaku x402

### Overview
AI-powered Solana token trading insights plugin for ElizaOS agents. Provides real-time KOL trader data analysis, trading signals, and token recommendations with X402 micropayment support.

### Package Information
- **NPM Package**: `plugin-otaku-x402`
- **Repository**: https://github.com/otaku-x402/elizaos-plugin-otaku-x402
- **Homepage**: https://otakux402.so
- **Version**: 1.0.0
- **License**: MIT

### Key Features
- **AI Token Analysis**: Real-time BUY/HOLD/SELL recommendations with confidence scores
- **Hot Tokens Monitor**: Track trending Solana tokens with 1h timeframe data
- **Trader Leaderboard**: Follow top KOL traders and their performance metrics
- **Trading Signals**: AI-driven signals with volume, momentum, and trader interest analysis
- **Risk Assessment**: Automatic LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH risk level evaluation
- **X402 Integration**: Support for micropayment-based data monetization

### Installation
```bash
npm install plugin-otaku-x402
```

### Quick Start
```typescript
import { kolPlugin } from 'plugin-otaku-x402';

export const character = {
    name: "Trading Agent",
    plugins: [kolPlugin],
    settings: {
        OTAKU_API_URL: "https://api.otakux402.so"
    }
};
```

### API Endpoints
- Hot Tokens: `GET /api/hot-tokens?timeframe=1h&limit=10`
- Leaderboard: `GET /api/leaderboard?timeframe=daily&limit=10`
- Traders: `GET /api/traders?limit=10`
- Trades: `GET /api/trades?limit=100`

### Documentation
- [README](https://github.com/otaku-x402/elizaos-plugin-otaku-x402#readme)
- [Installation Guide](https://github.com/otaku-x402/elizaos-plugin-otaku-x402/blob/main/INSTALLATION.md)
- [Quick Start](https://github.com/otaku-x402/elizaos-plugin-otaku-x402/blob/main/QUICK_START.md)
- [GitHub Release v1.0.0](https://github.com/otaku-x402/elizaos-plugin-otaku-x402/releases/tag/v1.0.0)

### Maintainer
**Otaku x402** (support@otakux402.so)

### Changes
- Added `plugin-otaku-x402` entry to `index.json`
- Alphabetically placed between `@elizaos/plugin-opacity` and `@elizaos/plugin-open-weather`

---

This plugin enables ElizaOS agents to provide sophisticated trading insights by analyzing real-time Solana token data from top KOL traders.

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Added plugin-otaku-x402 to the available plugin catalog, expanding integration options for users.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
